dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1509 IH: Healthy Food Financing Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Lee of California (for herself, Ms. Brown, and Mr. Evans) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to reauthorize the Healthy Food Financing Initiative, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthy Food Financing Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of Healthy Food Financing Initiative
section.text: Section 243(d) of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6953(d)) is amended to read as follows:

subsection.text: Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall use to carry out this sectionâ€”

paragraph.text: $50,000,000 for fiscal year 2028 and each fiscal year thereafter.
